creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
text:
Apache will not start up when it tries to execute:
LoadModule jserv_module modules/ApacheModuleJServ.dll

at the end of the httpd.conf file.

I started Tomcat first.  The Apache startup MS/DOS window pops up and closes almost instantly.
(ApacheModuleJServ.dll exists in the modules directory.)

Please help!
Cheers,
Blaine... 
blucyk@stones.com
